Author: whatdeyecallher
Text: I quit smoking and didn't gain any weight! Its actually totally doable. People associate weight gain with quitting because many people replace that hand-to-mouth action with food instead of cigarettes.  Drink tea/coffee anytime you want a cigarette (it's fucking HARD but not impossible). Take up knitting or something to keep your hands busy. Take advantage of your better breathing by being more active (ie, burning calories baby)
